name: WhaleNoise
0:
”Alexa open Whale Noise”
”Alexa ask Whale Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: whale noise
des:
Dive deep into the ocean with the majestic and haunting sounds of whales. These soothing calls and songs are perfect for relaxation, meditation, and bringing a touch of the ocean's beauty to your daily routine.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Whale Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
